subject: Horse Racing
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Trainer Todd Pletcher is headed to Churchill Downs after Monba won the $750,000 Blue Grass Stakes at Keeneland on Saturday and his stablemate Cowboy Cal finished second.
snippet: Trainer Todd Pletcher is headed to Churchill Downs after Monba won the $750,000 Blue Grass Stakes at Keeneland on Saturday and his stablemate Cowboy Cal finished second.
